name: Twisted Hitch
additionalNotes:
http://flatbedcigarcompany.com/Twisted-Hitch-Maduro-_p_198.html




PANACEA Twisted Hitch (6 1/2 X 55), Brazilian Maduro




Our Twisted Hitch!  Kin to the Hitch Pin. A 6 1/6 inch cigar with a 55 ring gauge.  This is a nice size cigar. Big enough to provide you with the full cigar experience, but not soooo big you need to block out the afternoon. Smooth, rich, sweet, spicy, creamy. The Twisted Hitch has it all....with a personality to boot.  Pig Tail top, with a shaggy, unfinished foot. The interior is: Cuban seed Seco. Ligero; Dominican (Piloto, Olor), and Nicaraguan. Wrapped with a sweet and spicy Brazilian Maduro wrapper. Binder is Dominican.
 
  
                
   •Strength: Medium
•Body: Full
•Taste: Hint of Spice, Molasses, Little bit-o-nutty
